name: KeHoSoftwareNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Learn more about the latest and current developments of the BOSCH XDK Sensor System and the LCARS SmartHome project of KeHo Software Achim Kern.
The networked home with its many possibilities and the control of our daily lives has now become established in reality - but this is only the beginning.
The future will be surpassed by more ideas and innovations that you have ever imagined.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
